text: In Greek mythology, Telamon (; Ancient Greek: Τελαμών) was the son of Aeacus, king of Aegina, and Endeïs, a mountain nymph. He was the older brother of Peleus. The brothers joined Jason as members of the Argonauts. He was also the father of Ajax the Greater and Teucer. They both fought during the Trojan War. Category:People in Greek mythology
title: Telamon
